message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $12,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. However, the value of this product is quite high, and $14,000 is already a competitive offer. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still not able to meet at $13,000. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This would allow me to stay within my budget while also acknowledging the value of what you're offering.
